episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4001_1001_0:
When you get too overconfident, you end up
learning the hard way.
Your name’s Bede, right? I hear you’re from Galar.

Gotta say, this was my first battle with you, but
you’re pretty strong! I’m impressed.
Oh, you must have an eye for talent!

It’s true, I’m the elitest of all of the elite...and it is
I who carries the future of Galar!

This loss was just a fluke. I’ll be sure that
next time—

Lemme stop you there. You’ve got talent, but you
can’t keep going like this.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4001_1001_1:
Keep doing things this way, and sure, you’ll get
strong to a certain point...
But you’re not gonna be beating any Champions.

How rude. It’s almost as if you’re insinuating that
I’ve got a flaw of some sort.
Yeah, I am. You’re definitely missing something.

Here, I have just the thing for you. Y’see, there’s
gonna be an event soon...

It’s called the New Stars of Pasio tournament.
Feel up for that?

Everyone who joins this tournament will be
randomly placed on a three-person team.

Maybe battling with teammates will help you get
a new perspective.

Hmph. Very well. In any case, this sounds like the
perfect opportunity to showcase my talent.

I’ll join this tournament and prove that I’m
already perfectly perfect!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4002_1001_0:
Ugh! C’mon, how many times do I have to
say this?!

We’re a team, so make sure you keep an eye on
what the rest of us are doing!

Hmph. I’m the strongest one here, so you two
should adjust to ME.
Everything will work itself out if you just do that!
Big talk. You’re so sure you’re stronger than us?

Why don’t we have a battle and see if that’s
true, then?
Fine. If that’s what you need, I’ll take you on!

S-stop it, you two! We’re a team, so we shouldn’t
be fighting amongst ourselves!

Why don’t we at least try battling another
team first?
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4003_1001_0:
Oh, we’ll have no trouble at all if it’s Hop’s team
we’re battling.

Why are you always so cheeky, mate? Don’t be
too surprised when you get taken down by
our teamwork!
I can’t believe it... I lost to Hop, of all people?!

Bede and Hugh, you were just barking orders over
each other...

So it was more like we were battling you one by
one, instead of as a team.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4003_1001_1:
You two might benefit from supporting each other
more as teammates.

Like I’ve already said before, just be a good sport
and follow MY lead!

There’s no way I’m sitting back and taking
orders from you.
Ah! Bede! Hugh! Where are you going?!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4004_1001_0: Ohoho... Did you see that battle just now?

Yeah. Their team was a mess. They’re totally out
of sync!

Their Pokémon might be strong, but we’ve got
nothing to fear from shoddy teamwork like that!

I know! Let’s get them at the tournament! We can
use that as an opportunity to snag their Pokémon!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4005_1001_0:
Why do I have to go through the hassle of
teaming up, anyway...

Oh. Marnie... And if my memory serves me
correctly, that must be Barry and Gladion.

You gettin’ some trainin’ done before the
tournament?
Well...yes, I suppose you could say that.
I hear Hugh and Wally are on your team!
How’s that going? Perfect, I bet!
No. Far from it, actually. It’s the worst.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4005_1001_1: Why did this have to be a team tournament?

I would’ve been fine if I were battling on
my own...
Teaming up is nothing but a pain in the neck.

Y’know...learnin’ how to work together with your
teammates can help you get stronger as a Trainer.

That’s why I’m gonna work hard with my
teammates and win this tournament!

I’ve got a feeling I can use what I learn here to
make Spikemuth even better!

One day, Spikemuth’s gonna be the top town in
Galar. Just you wait an’ see!

So...you’re shouldering the hopes of your
hometown when you battle here?
Of course! It’s all for my ultimate dream!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4005_1001_2:
I’m also lookin’ forward to battling you and
your team, Bede.

If you and your teammates are having a fight,
you’d better work things out and get back
on track.

Sure you weren’t. Well, we’ve got to get back
to practice.

I’m looking forward to seeing you at the
tournament, Bede!

She’s trying to get stronger... Not for her own
sake but to make her hometown better...

I suppose the difference between us is the scope
of our ambition.
Then...what’s a bigger goal I could aim for?
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4006_1001_0: I see. So that’s what happened, huh.

I’ve never met anyone with such a stuck-up
personality in my life.

I guess that’s why you two don’t mesh. You’ve
always disliked anything that goes against
your values.

You didn’t enter the tournament just to have a
fight with your teammates, right?

Sometimes you have to meet the other person in
the middle.

A teammate is a peer who stands beside you
on equal footing.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4006_1001_1:
If you’re on the same team and have the same
goal in mind, why not try to figure out what you
can do to support them?

Yeah! I bet you’d have way more fun if you all
supported each other!
A peer on equal footing, huh...
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4007_1101_0:
Eventually, the day of the New Stars of Pasio
tournament arrived.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4007_1001_0: It’s finally time for the tournament to start...

Of course you are. Everyone gathered today is
here to win.
But if we’re really in this to win...
we’ve got to cooperate as a team.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4007_1001_1:
Adapting my own battle style to match someone
else may end up being a valuable experience.

Although for me, it’s more so that we can
dominate these matches!

I refuse to continue losing in such a
disgraceful manner.
Well...when you need a hand, I’ll cover you.
And trust me, we’re not gonna lose anymore.

I’ll hold you to that. Don’t even think about
slowing us down.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4007_1001_2: What in the world is going on?!

These punks were gonna take advantage of
this tournament.

They were planning to wait until we were
all tired...
then swoop in and steal all of our Pokémon!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4008_1001_0:
What’s wrong? If you don’t think you can beat me
one by one, I’m fine with taking you all on
at once!

We were worried about you being alone, so we
came to check on you.

Heh. Is that so? Gotta admit, I feel more secure
with you guys here.

I know all about you and your terrible teamwork!
We saw how you lost to everyone else
during practice!

We’ll have no trouble taking your team down...
And then all of your Pokémon will be ours for
the taking!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4008_1001_1:
So not only did you interfere with
our tournament...
you were planning on stealing our partners, too?!

Just to let you know...you’re about to feel
my rage!

Yeah! I won’t just stand by and let you do that,
Team Break!
Heh. It’s about time you all got on the same page.

I guess joining the tournament really did teach you
a thing or two.

Well...I suppose it HAS made me stronger...
Just a little bit.
But this has nothing to do with the tournament.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4008_1001_2:
Since...we had to leave the tournament behind
for this.
Nah, I don’t think you’ll have to worry about that.

We heard about everything from Gladion, so we
came to help you out!

You Team Break punks better be ready for a
good walloping!

I needed to warm up, anyway... Let me join this
battle, too.
I guess we’re ALL on the same page.

Right. Let’s cut loose on these losers and head
right back to the tournament!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4008_1001_3: Yep! I can’t wait to get this battle started!

Let’s start off on the right foot so we can win the
tournament, too!

Come on, you two! We’re gonna wipe the floor
with these guys and show ’em that we’re
number one!

Yeah! We’ll show you how much better our
teamwork has gotten after training together!

Heh. If you refuse to back down, we have no
choice but to take you out.

Silver. Have you been doing that training I told
you about?
Hmph. You’ll see for yourself once the battle starts!
Heh. Then let’s see what you’ve got!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4008_1001_4:
Yeah, we’re taking down every last one of
these punks!

It appears you’ve chosen the wrong team to
mess with.
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4201_1031_0:
Team or no team, I am
always the winner!
episode_event_rivalmeeting01/4201_1001_0:
I have to battle in a team? I just hope the other
members of my team don’t hold me back.

Well...even then, I’ll be sure to win. I’m the pride
of Galar—and the most elite Trainer of them all!
